spec_data.Name: texlive-tikzscale
spec_data.Description:
The package extends the \includegraphics command to support
tikzpictures. It allows scaling of TikZ images and PGFPlots to
a given width or height without changing the text size.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:00:29 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Resize pictures while respecting text size
